Daily Schmankerl: The aftermath of Bayern Munich vs. RB Leipzig; Bayern not pursuing Marcus Rashford; Milan Å kriniar leaving PSG?; Real Madrid plotting Premier League double swoop?; Ryan Gravenberch staying at Liverpool?; and MORE!
arts.sum: Bayern Munich stormed into the Winterpause with a spectacular 5-1 victory over RB Leipzig in a match that meant a ton to both teams. Olise has had a very nice first half of the season for Bayern Munich, though sometimes he gets impatient with his positioning when on the weak side and creeps in too far centrally.

arts.ttl: Konrad Laimer pleased with Bayern Munichâ€™s strong showing against RB Leipzig
arts.sum: RB Leipzig were put to the sword, with the Bayern midfield displaying their superior quality, while the attack finished off chances with aplomb. Bayern Munich held nothing back in what was a scintillating attacking performance against top Bundesliga opposition.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munichâ€™s Joshua Kimmich proud of his teamâ€™s reaction to Mainz loss in 5-1 thumping of RB Leipzig
arts.sum: Bayern Munich finished up its pre-winter break schedule with a bang, firing five goals past a hapless RB Leipzig side. Having come off its first league defeat of the campaign, a 2-1 loss to Mainz, and with Bayer Leverkusen hot on its heels, it was crucial that Bayern come away with all three points against the visiting Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich cancels post match press conference following statement on Magdeburg
arts.sum: Thoughts and prayers to the innocent victims in the brutal attack. And it is a tradition that was senselessly and brutally violated in German city Magdeburg this year.

arts.ttl: Bayern, Leipzig coaches in shock after Magdeburg incident
arts.sum: Bayern Munich coach Vincent Kompany and RB Leipzig counterpart Marco Rose struggled to discuss Bayern's 5-1 Bundesliga victory on Friday after two people were killed when a car drove into crowds at a Christmas market in Magdeburg. "Yes, we played football.

arts.ttl: Match Awards from Bayern Munichâ€™s crushing 5-1 win over RB Leipzig
arts.sum: The Slovenian forward scored the sole goal for the visitors and it was a stunner to tie the game 1-1 in the first two minutes of the match. The heartbeat of the squad and leader Joshua Kimmich had an excellent performance for Bayern.

arts.ttl: Bavarian Podcast Works: Postgame Show â€” Bayern Munich 5-1 RB Leipzig (Bundesliga)
arts.sum: Also, be sure to stay tuned to Bavarian Podcast Works for all of your up to date coverage on Bayern Munich and Germany. Bayern Munich hosted RB Leipzig for a Bundesliga showdown in the final match before the Winterpause.

arts.ttl: Four Observations from Bayern Munichâ€™s cathartic 5-1 win over RB Leipzig
arts.sum: After Bayern Munich â€™s recent poor run of form against Leipzig under Thomas Tuchel, the combination of such a poor opponent and such a brilliant Bayern side helped the club finally turn the corner. Whether Bayern can reach this level they reached against Leipzig consistently will determine how much success the club will taste in 2025, but it still promises to be a year filled with many more trophies than 2024.

arts.ttl: European football: Bayern beat Leipzig 5-1 as Reijnders delivers Christmas win
arts.sum: Kane returns from injury in Bundesliga thrashing Milan beat Verona 1-0; Girona sink Real Valladolid Bayern Munich stamped their authority on the Bundesliga by hammering fourth-placed RB Leipzig 5-1 in a game that featured two goals in the opening two minutes for the first time in the leagueâ€™s history. Having lost their first league match of the season to Mainz last week, Bayern delivered a commanding performance against a Leipzig side who struggled to build any attacking momentum.
